turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I want to I want to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want tallest cappuccino soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they offer traditional size, small, medium, or large size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a small cappuccino with soy milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i order that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a small cappuccino with soy milk to be picked up at the pete's in serramonte, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for help Google Assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you, and your coffee will be ready for pickup in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all my query, thanks hurrying. Have a nice day, thank you. Yes, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you too enjoy your coffee.
